bibl.title: Cessions of Katoikic Land in the Late Ptolemaic Period.
bibl.note: A version of this paper was read at the 21st International Congress of Papyrology, Berlin, August 13-19, 1995. - Discusses a number of texts which concern the cession of land from one κάτοικος ἱππεύς to another κάτοικος ἱππεύς.
bibl.seg: OATES John F., Cessions of Katoikic Land in the Late Ptolemaic Period.

A version of this paper was read at the 21st International Congress of Papyrology, Berlin, August 13-19, 1995. - Discusses a number of texts which concern the cession of land from one κάτοικος ἱππεύς to another κάτοικος ἱππεύς.
